title: BOC can Reverse tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in an approved tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks reverse
custom_expected:
THEN tx is reversed
AND successful notification appears
AND status is updated in tx and player history
AND player's pending status is reversed
IF the player has an outstanding tx then show error

title: Club receives notification when tx is Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC has approved the tx
custom_steps: WHEN the club views their notifications
custom_expected:
THEN tx appears
AND links work

title: User can receive a notification on the 3rd day of a player's Paternity List placement
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has been on the Paternity List for 3 days or more
custom_steps: WHEN the user runs nightly notification batch
custom_expected:
THEN a new notification is generated for both the BOC- Major Transactions- Admin and the Club- Major Transactions- Admin users. 
AND Type will be Inactive List. 
AND The notification description should be Please Reinstate from Major League Paternity List. 
AND Both the player name and the notification description should link to the Player's Player History.

title: BOC user can approve a Reinstate from Inactive List transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND the Reinstate from Inactive List tx is Preliminary
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
AND A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved.
AND Update player's MJ or MN Roster Statuses accordingly to be what it was prior to being placed on the Inactive List, unless "Do Not Activate" checkbox is checked.
AND If Do Not Activate checkbox is checked, set the player's Roster status to "Reinstated/Not Active"

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Deceased List transaction for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Inactive List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Place on Deceased List" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND if no Preliminary "Place on Deceased List" tx exists within the last 10 days, selecting "Place on Deceased List" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction
BUT if a Preliminary "Place on Deceased List" tx does exist within the last 10 days system should load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction
AND transaction should follow wireframe and data discovery

title: BOC user can approve a Place on Deceased List transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC approver
AND is viewing a Place on Deceased List tx in view or edit mode 
AND tx is in preliminary state
AND user sees an "Approve" button on the form in blue
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if the item was in edit mode, it should be reloaded in view mode
AND successful blue notification should be displayed that states the transaction was approved. See Messages #17
AND system should update Player's Player History: Code = DEAD (NOT displayed on front end) , Description = Place on Deceased List , From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND system should Update player's MJ or MN Roster Statuses to be "Deceased"
BUT system should NOT display this roster status. On front end roster status should appear blank
AND Roster status should not appear on profile or in advanced search 
AND logo displayed on player profile should be updated to standard MLB logo to signify they are no longer associated with a team
AND tx should NOT be added to Daily Transaction Bulletin

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Disqualified List tx for a MJ player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a MJ Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Create New>Major>Inactive List>Disqualified List
custom_expected:
THEN new preliminary tx opens
AND form follows DD and wireframe

title: BOC user can approve a Place on Disqualified List tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a submitted tx
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rules checks
AND successful notification displays
AND tx/player history/status updates
AND tx reloads in view mode

title: BOC user can reverse a Place on Military List tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Military List" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND player's MJ and MN Roster Status, Club and Org should be set to values from prior to transaction approval

title: BOC user can reject a Place on Military List tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND there is a MN Place on Military Tx in a state of Submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #15.
AND If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
AND Reverse player's Pending org and club. 
AND Remove pending player history entry.

title: User can create a new Place on Voluntarily Retired List tx for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on a MN player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting "Place on Voluntarily Retired List" from the Create New
custom_expected:
THEN  the system will load a new Preliminary transaction
BUT  If a preliminary or rejected transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
AND If a submitted transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in View Mode.

title: BOC user can approve or reject a Place on Voluntarily Retired List tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND there is a Place on Voluntarily Retired List tx in a preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve or Reject
custom_expected:
THEN Approve the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
AND A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved. See Messages #17. 
AND Update Player's Player History: Code = RETIR , Description = Place on Voluntarily Retired List , From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font. 
AND Update player's MJ or MN Roster Statuses accordingly to be Voluntarily Retired.
BUT Rejected the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #15.
AND If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
AND Reverse player's Pending org and club. 
AND Remove pending player history entry.

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Ineligible List tx for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Minor" should limit third and fourth levels to only MN items
AND "Inactive List" should be an option under Minor Transactions
AND "Place on Ineligible List" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND if no Preliminary "Place on Ineligible List" tx exists within the last 10 days, selecting "Place on Ineligible List" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction
BUT if a Preliminary "Place on Ineligible List" tx does exist within the last 10 days system should load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction
AND transaction should follow wireframe and data discovery

title: BOC user can reverse and suppress a Place on Ineligible List tx - Not Latest Approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on Ineligible List" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC user can create a new Pending Suspension transaction for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Pending Suspension" from the Create New for a MN player
custom_expected:
THEN the system will load a new Preliminary transaction
BUT if there is an existing Preliminary MN Pending Suspension transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date. 
AND If a preliminary transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Suspended List tx for a MJ player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to a PPP
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new>IL>Place on suspended list tx
custom_expected:
THEN tx loads in same window
AND follows AC, DD and wireframe
IF saved preliminary tx exists that tx loads instead

title: BOC user can approve or reject a Place on Suspended List transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user 
AND there is a Place on Suspended List tx (MN Tx Only)
custom_steps:
WHEN Clicking "Approve"
AND  Clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN when approved a successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved.
AND Update Player's Player History: Code = SUSPD , Description = Place on Suspended List , From Org/Club fields to be in black font. 
AND Update player's MJ or MN Roster Statuses accordingly to be Suspended. 
BUt when rejected successful reject notification is displayed. 
AND If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
AND Reverse player's Pending org and club. 
AND Remove pending player history entry.

title: User can create a new Place on Restricted List tx for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a Pro Player Profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new>MN>IL>Place on restricted list
custom_expected:
THEN a new form opens in edit mode
IF form was previously saved i the past 10 days
THEN that forms opens instead

title: BOC user can reverse, reverse and suppress or suppress a Place on Restricted List tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an approved tx
OR reversed tx
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks reverse or reverse and suppress
OR suppress
custom_expected:
THEN tx first reverses then suppresses
AND tx status/player history is updated
AND successful notification displays
IF tx is NOT most recent THEN show error

title: User can create a new Place on Temporarily Inactive List transaction for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on a PPP
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks create new>inactive list>place on temporarily inactive list
custom_expected:
THEN tx opens in same window
AND tx follows DD and wireframe

title: BOC user can approve or reject a Place on Temporarily Inactive List tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the tx has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks approve
OR clicks reject
custom_expected:
THEN system runs rule checks
AND tx/player history/status updates
AND successful notification displays
AND clipboard item is removed
AND tx reloads in view mode

title: BOC user can create a new Place on Ineligible List transaction for a MN player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on Ineligible List" from the Create New
custom_expected:
THEN if there is an existing Preliminary MN Place on Ineligible List transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date. 
AND If a preliminary transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
BUT If no preliminary transaction created within 10 days of the current date exists, the system will load a new Preliminary transaction.
